alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, southwestern Shackelford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1036 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hodges, or near Hawley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Tye, Hawley, Hamby, Nugent, Impact, Funston, Mccarty Lake, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600, Hodges, Truby and Stith. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 272 and 299. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
